For each request, selectthe blue Send button. When you see a success message, move on to the next request.Use the Create or Update Index REST API for this request.
The index schema is organized around hotels content. Sample data consists of thenames, descriptions, and locations of seven fictitious hotels. This schema includes fieldsfor vector and traditional keyword search, with configurations for vector and semanticranking.The following example is a subset of the full index.
